title: Riven Montage
body:
This is my first attempt at this sort of style of video, let me know what you guys think.

I post videos twice a week :)

replies.body: Great video! I also liked how you added the abilities you were using in fights on the corners of the video. :)

> [{quoted}](name=xJimeh,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=W5Eerl72,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-15T21:25:14.255+0000)
>
> Great video! I also liked how you added the abilities you were using in fights on the corners of the video. :)

Thank you :)
Yeah, pretty good video. Really good {{champion:92}}  mechanics there
surprises me how bursty riven still is (even though no where near as she used to be)

I liked it but the music just didn't suit this kind of video.

Very well done on the Editing.

+1
